attributes.action: To give a choice to whether Omega 3 fish oils are used in food products or not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am allergic to fish,shellfish,fish oils and fish products. I can't be the only person in the country who can no longer eat any spread, or biscuits or yoghurts or cakes because the government are encouraging the use Omega 3 fish oils. The list of items I can eat is reducing day by day. It is about time we had a choice of food unadulterated with fish products.
